top-page.title:
Set your 
rent payments 
on auto-pilot
top-page.desc:
Invite your tenants to pay rent using Rentorr 
and get the money deposited directly to your 
account each month.

title-one.title: What it takes to set up payments

item.title: Monthly Payments
item.text: Set up your monthly rental payments and let your tenant choose to pay manually or set up automatic payments. They get notified before the due date each month, and we let you know when it’s on the way.

item.title: Security Deposit
item.text: When you set up your payment series, add the security deposit and let your tenants pay it with their first month’s rent.

item.title: One-time Fees
item.text: Have other one-time fees you need to assess? Not a problem. Add them to the payment series, and collect it with their rent.

title-two.title: Why choose Rentorr for payment processing?

text-start.title: Effortless Rent Collection
text-start.text: Enjoy the hassle-free payment processing. Get funds transfer to your bank account within one business day. Get real-time payments and updates from your tenants to know the status of rent for each individual tenant.

text-center.title: Detailed Records
text-center.text: The only thing more important that getting rent on time is making sure you have the receipts. Rentorr provided monthly breakdowns, including one-time or recurring fees? that are all separated for easy reporting.

text-end.title: Tenant Credit Building
text-end.text: Help your tenants build their credit history when they pay rent online. Once they opt-in, we’ll automatically report on-tine rent payments to the credit bureau, which helps build their credit history.

tenat.title: Focus on your properties, let us worry about the hard stuff
tenat.text: Live where you want. Never worry about missing another opportunity again because your rental application wasn’t first.

ready.title: Ready to start using Rentorr
ready.desc: It shouldn’t feel like a second job to live in a rental property. Rentorr was made to simplify the process and help you and your landlord have a better renting experience.

img-desc.title: Focus on your properties, let us worry about the hard stuff
img-desc.text: We’ve partnered with Flutterwave to ensure our bank connections are secure and that your payment information is kept safe. Plus we never keep your information (even for recurring payments). Just one extra step to make sure your data is secure.
